      • transRamdonGenerator

        public int transRamdonGenerator()
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.sql.SQLException
        Generates a random transaction number, making sure is not repeated by doing a query for current transaction numbers stored in the database.
        Returns:
        an integer specifying the transaction number generated.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case of invalid data entered.
        java.sql.SQLException - In case database is not available.
